attributes.action: Give Volodymyr Zelenskyy a honorary Knighthood
attributes.additional_details:
Volodymyr Zelenskyy has stood up for the democratic World by standing up against a brutal regime lead by the Russian leader Putin. 
Despite the invasion of his country, Volodymyr Zelenskyy has stayed calm and lead his people.
His leadership is an admiration for the rest of the world.
attributes.background: Parliament  to debate as to whether Volodymyr Zelenskyy, Ukrainian President should be given a honorary Knighthood.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
